channel.title: Endrosia | Hybrid Server | 24/7 | Amazing Combat | 16GB Dedi Server
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/VZi3x.png[/img] [B]Credits to Agent Dan[/B]
[center][b][u]16 GB Dedi Server! $850 a month![/u][/b]
[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/1zt8va.jpg[/img][/center]
[B][U][COLOR=Yellow]WE ARE NOW 24/7 WITH ALMOST DAILY UPDATES, AND A OWNER WHO WILL LISTEN TO YOU! Join![/COLOR][/U][/B]
[B][COLOR=Red]EDIT: We have switched to a new base (Enigma), this is because I realized how crappy the combat was, where as with this one I know it's got really good combat and hybridding etc, I have decided I will be implementing ALL features from Endrosia onto here, though. So it is STILL a bounty hunter PvP Server, just I need to add it in a few days! Come and join.[/COLOR][/B]
[SIZE=5][URL=http://www.endrosia.com/play.html]Webclient[/URL] | [URL=http://www.endrosia.com/client.jar]Downloadable Client[/URL] | [URL=http://www.endrosia.com]Forums[/URL][/SIZE]

item.title: Endrosia | Hybrid Server | 24/7 | Amazing Combat | 16GB Dedi Server
item.dc:creator: @HydrationPK HydrationPK
item.description:
@HydrationPK wrote:

‘boss system’ has been added! Today, I have added Revenants! As it fits in with them dropping the PvP armour.

They are located at level 25 wilderness. You will have to type ::Revs to get there, they have a chance of dropping a PvP armour every 55 kills (This is due to change, it was just a number I thought was fair, it may be lowered in the future, or even tonight)

In other news:
::Welfare has been added, for you mystic/rune/dhide hybridders
::Empty has also been added, I will be adding the new bank interface hopefully tomorrow
::Settag has been added fully, you will now be able to ::settag (This wasn’t available to normal players before)
::Setlevel now works, so you can pure brid.

Read full topic
